channel.title: Uncategorized on DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on DevOps

item.title: Welcome to my website
item.description: This site is going to help me document things that I could forget and it will be my personal reference, The site is dedicated to sysadmin and devops first and foremost. You will also find a great deal of automation, CI/CD, containerization, coding, and etc. Hope you enjoy this blog post.
